price: Nendeni kwenye kivuli chenye mapande matatu!
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ
footnotes: Nendeni kwenye joto la moshi wa Jahannamu ulio gawika kwa ukubwa wake mapande matatu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
